about_the_game:
Explore a colorful underwater city full of merpeople! This ocean town for RPG Maker expands the possibilities for your sea settings.

The Mermaid City Tileset Includes:

Ground tiles (most include 3 colors – blue, green and brown):

Water
Dirt texture
Path texture
Lighter dirt
Tile
Fancy tile
Black marble
Barnacles
Cracks
Rocks
Path with transparency
Sea Grass
Hole
Spike traps

Walls/roofs:

4 types of “outdoor” walls/roof in three colors. Also includes black/white marble, plains tone, and brick with matching roofs.

Also includes:

Matching stairs and additional floor tiles
Furniture – tables, shell chairs, dressers, screens and more
Dishware and fish
Nests and eggs
Nets
Shell decor + shells with writing (can be used for signs, graves, etc)
Pillars, arches, rails, and other structural elements, with shiny blue jewels
Various windows and door shapes
Matching hanging decor – blue glass orbs, shells and more
Lots of statues, male and female, plain and detailed versions
Signs
Coral and seaweed
Rocks and crystals
And more!

Note: the rocks, coral, etc come in clear water and murky water versions. The town setting matches both out of the box, so you don’t need to adjust them.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
